org.omancode.r.ui

Interface RUICommand


  • public interface RUICommand
    An R command generated from a set of GUI elements defined by a JavaBuilder YAML UI definition.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    Oliver Mannion

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String generateCmdText(Map<String,Object> uiElements)
      Generate an R command text string from the UI elements.
      String getName()
      Get RUICommand name.
      String[] getVariableTypes()
      The types of variable class this command works on.
      String getYAML()
      JavaBuilder YAML UI definition that defines the GUI.
      boolean isChart()
      Does this command produce a chart?

    • Method Detail

      • getVariableTypes

        String[] getVariableTypes()
        The types of variable class this command works on. eg: "list", "data.frame", "integer" etc. Use null to work on all objects. The RObjectTreeBuilder will only display objects of these types.
        Returns:
        string array of class type names.

      • generateCmdText

        String generateCmdText(Map<String,Object> uiElements)
        Generate an R command text string from the UI elements.
        Parameters:
        uiElements - UI elements
        Returns:
        R command text string

      • getName

        String getName()
        Get RUICommand name.
        Returns:
        name

      • getYAML

        String getYAML()
               throws IOException
        JavaBuilder YAML UI definition that defines the GUI.
        Returns:
        YAML UI definition
        Throws:
        IOException - if problem reading YAML

      • isChart

        boolean isChart()
        Does this command produce a chart?
        Returns:
        true if this command produce a chart.
